DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate ATP-induced Pain ( AIP ) ATP-induced dermal vasodilation ( AIDV ) target engagement tool future development analgesic .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate ATP-induced Pain ATP-induced Dermal Vasodilation Iontophoresis ( 0000-118 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Subject generally good health Subject willing abstain smoking within 24 hour iontophoresis treatment limit smoke 5 less cigarette per week study Subject history dermatitis , psoriasis , eczema Subject active asthma and/or hay fever time screen visit Subject unable refrain use analgesic within 3 day prior treatment period
